courseUploadTip1: Set the Course Price option or make it free.
courseUploadTip2: Standard size for the course thumbnail is 700x430.
courseUploadTip3: Video section controls the course overview video.
courseUploadTip4: Course Builder is where you create & organize a course.
courseUploadTip5: Add Topics in the Course Builder section to create lessons, quizzes, and assignments.
courseUploadTip6: Prerequisites refers to the fundamental courses to complete before taking this particular course.
courseUploadTip7: Information from the Additional Data section shows up on the course single page.
